verbs.description: [V: astros] [ARGM-DIS: alex bregman] [ARGM-PRP: to join espn as analyst for world series game 3] [ARG0: astros third baseman alex bregman] will serve as a guest analyst for espn for game 3 of the world series on friday at dodger stadium in los angeles the chronicle david barron reports
